transform_handler.py

1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 # Libs
4 import rospy
5 from tf2_ros import Buffer, TransformListener, StaticTransformBroadcaster
6 from tf.transformations import quaternion_from_euler, euler_from_quaternion
7 
8 # Messages
9 from geometry_msgs.msg import TransformStamped, Pose, Quaternion, Point
10 
11 
12 class ArmTCPTransformHandlerException(Exception):
13  pass
14 
15 
16 class ArmTCPTransformHandler:
17  """
18  This class uses a TransformListener to handle transforms related to the TCP.
19  """
20 
21  def __init__(self):
22  self.__tf_buffer = Buffer()
23  self.__tf_listener = TransformListener(self.__tf_buffer)
24  self.__static_broadcaster = StaticTransformBroadcaster()
25 
26  def ee_link_to_tcp_pose_target(self, pose, ee_link):
27  try:
28  transform_tcp_to_ee_link = self.__tf_buffer.lookup_transform(ee_link, "TCP", rospy.Time(0))
29  transform_tcp_to_ee_link.header.frame_id = "ee_link_target"
30  transform_tcp_to_ee_link.child_frame_id = "tcp_target"
31 
32  transform_world_to_tcp_target = self.transform_from_pose(pose, "base_link", "ee_link_target")
33 
34  transform_time = rospy.Time.now()
35  transform_world_to_tcp_target.header.stamp = transform_time
36  transform_tcp_to_ee_link.header.stamp = transform_time
37  self.__tf_buffer.set_transform(transform_world_to_tcp_target, "default_authority")
38  self.__tf_buffer.set_transform(transform_tcp_to_ee_link, "default_authority")
39 
40  ee_link_target_transform = self.__tf_buffer.lookup_transform("base_link",
41  "tcp_target",
42  rospy.Time(0),
43  rospy.Duration.from_sec(1.0))
44 
45  return self.pose_from_transform(ee_link_target_transform.transform)
46  except ArmTCPTransformHandlerException:
47  self.set_empty_tcp_to_ee_link_transform(ee_link)
48  return pose
49 
50  def tcp_to_ee_link_pose_target(self, pose, ee_link):
51  try:
52  stamp = rospy.Time.now()
53  transform_world_to_tcp_target = self.transform_from_pose(pose, "base_link", "tcp_target", stamp=stamp)
54  self.__tf_buffer.set_transform(transform_world_to_tcp_target, "default_authority")
55 
56  transform_tcp_to_ee_link = self.__tf_buffer.lookup_transform("TCP", ee_link, rospy.Time(0))
57  transform_tcp_to_ee_link.header.frame_id = "tcp_target"
58  transform_tcp_to_ee_link.child_frame_id = "ee_link_target"
59  transform_tcp_to_ee_link.header.stamp = stamp
60  self.__tf_buffer.set_transform(transform_tcp_to_ee_link, "default_authority")
61 
62  ee_link_target_transform = self.__tf_buffer.lookup_transform("base_link", "ee_link_target", rospy.Time(0))
63 
64  return self.pose_from_transform(ee_link_target_transform.transform)
65  except ArmTCPTransformHandlerException:
66  self.set_empty_tcp_to_ee_link_transform(ee_link)
67  return pose
68 
69  def tcp_to_ee_link_position_target(self, position, ee_link):
70  pose = Pose(position, Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1))
71  return self.tcp_to_ee_link_pose_target(pose, ee_link).position
72 
73  def tcp_to_ee_link_quaternion_target(self, quaternion, ee_link):
74  pose = Pose(Point(0, 0, 0), quaternion)
75  return self.tcp_to_ee_link_pose_target(pose, ee_link).orientation
76 
77  def tcp_to_ee_link_rpy_target(self, roll, pitch, yaw, ee_link):
78  qx, qy, qz, qw = quaternion_from_euler(roll, pitch, yaw)
79  pose = Pose(Point(0, 0, 0), Quaternion(qx, qy, qz, qw))
80  pose = self.tcp_to_ee_link_pose_target(pose, ee_link)
81  new_roll, new_pitch, new_yaw = euler_from_quaternion(*pose.orientation)
82  return new_roll, new_pitch, new_yaw
83 
84  def set_empty_tcp_to_ee_link_transform(self, ee_link):
85  ee_link_to_tcp_transform = self.transform_from_pose(Pose(Point(0, 0, 0), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1)),
86  ee_link,
87  "TCP",
88  stamp=rospy.Time.now())
89  self.__static_broadcaster.sendTransform(ee_link_to_tcp_transform)
90  return ee_link_to_tcp_transform
91 
92  def lookup_transform(self, target_frame, source_frame, stamp=None):
93  if stamp is None:
94  stamp = rospy.Time.now()
95  return self.__tf_buffer.lookup_transform(target_frame, source_frame, stamp)
96 
97  def display_target_pose(self, pose, name="target_pose"):
98  t = self.transform_from_pose(pose, "base_link", name)
99  self.__static_broadcaster.sendTransform(t)
100 
101  @staticmethod
102  def transform_from_pose(pose, parent_frame, child_frame, stamp=None):
103  t = TransformStamped()
104  t.transform.translation.x = pose.position.x
105  t.transform.translation.y = pose.position.y
106  t.transform.translation.z = pose.position.z
107 
108  t.transform.rotation = pose.orientation
109 
110  t.header.frame_id = parent_frame
111  t.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
112  t.child_frame_id = child_frame
113 
114  if stamp:
115  t.header.stamp = stamp
116 
117  return t
118 
119  @staticmethod
120  def pose_from_transform(transform):
121  pose = Pose()
122  pose.position.x = transform.translation.x
123  pose.position.y = transform.translation.y
124  pose.position.z = transform.translation.z
125  pose.orientation = transform.rotation
126  return pose
